page.title: 18GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content:
BRITISH BULLDOG - Any number can play. the game is usually played in a field or a playground.Players line up at one end of their chosen playing area and have to get to the other end.Trying to stop them will be,at first,one boy or girl.On a chosen signal,the players will try to rush past the player who is "it".If he or she touches any player,then that player has to join hands with the person in the middle. Eventually,there is a huge chain of players in the middle trying to catch the few survivors.The winner is the last player who has not been caught.He then tries to trick or rush his way past all the other players.
A variant of this is that you have to be lifted of the ground to be caught by the middle players,who,when they have touched you,may release hands.
